description:
The User Id of the person to be notified after a new hire is imported successfully.
Must be a valid, active Paycor User Id.
User must have a Hiring Role, Limited Hiring Role, or relevant hiring privileges.
User must have a valid email and/or phone number if notifications are sent via email or SMS, depending on client settings.
Invalid Guid, inactive UserId, or missing privileges will result in the user not being notified.
